title: Talking AI and Cannabis With Brad Moore, CEO and Director of Global Cannabis Applications Corp.
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Brad Moore, CEO and Director of Global Cannabis Applications Corp., joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the evolution of GCAC from a technology development company to its focus today - producing better outcomes for medical cannabis patients. We also discuss the role of AI and blockchain in the sector, the difference between Canadian, US and EU regulations and the money to be made in peripheral industries. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
